block.field: FONTS ARE LOADED IN INIT TAB

This popup modal window
is opened on scene load
by the "Pop-Up Modal Open"
puzzle, as seen above.
It's positioned by the
top and left position fields
with position: relative used.
It's width is 250px.

___________________________

Click the cube for info modal #2.
___________________________
/* UN-COMMENT THE BELOW LINE TO USE */ /*background: rgba( 0, 50, 0, .4) !important;*/

Footer space for footnotes,
a menu or copyright information.

This popup modal window is opened by clicking on the cube object.
and is positioned by the
top and left position fields
with position: relative used.
It's width is 60% of the parent modal background
which is 100% of it's parent window size.

___________________________

Click the "#3" annotation for the third info modal.
___________________________
Footer space for footnotes, a menu or copyright information.

This popup modal window is opened by clicking on an annotation.
and is positioned by the
top and left position fields
with position: relative used.
It's width is 300px.
Footer space for footnotes, a menu or copyright information.
